name: Recollection (Zaikiai)
description:
Recollection~

You play as Ella, she grew up in a very small town and was always told never to venture into the forest. One night she got tired of never being able to do anything, so she did the one thing she shouldn't have done. Went in the forest.

They found her in a coma, but little did Ella know she was trapped in her mind trying to escape by defeating her demons. She must fight her inner demons in order to escape and come back to reality.
